paper_abstract: In 1987, Shapiro showed that composition operator induced by symbol phi is compact on the Lipschitz space if and only if the infinity norm of phi is less than 1 by a spectral-theoretic argument, where phi is a holomorphic self-map of the unit disk. In this note! we Shall generalize Shapiro's result to the n-dimensional case.
paper_title: COMPACTNESS OF COMPOSITION OPERATOR IN THE LIPSCHITZ SPACE OF THE POLYDISC
